sourcesContent:
Latest Version = {{ vName }}
{{ log }}
import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vc-logs', templateUrl: './vc-logs.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vc-logs.component.scss'], }) export class VcLogsComponent implements OnInit { _vName: string; @Input() get vName() { return this._vName; } set vName(name: string) { if (!name) return; if (!this._vName) { this.logs.push(`initial version is ${name.trim()}`); } else { this.logs.push(`version changed to ${name.trim()}`); } this._vName = name; } logs: string[] = []; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
